review: *** ** *** **** *** ****** My experience has been great so far! I visited atleast close to 7-8 dentists for smile related treatment.  She explained everything in detail about the treatment and made me comfortable to opt for ceramic braces. I am currently undergoing the treatment with her. The journey has been easy breezy, thanks to her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Sneha is very friendly *** ************* *******  She explained the entire braces process well.  They provide all services under 1 roof so its very convenient, and also they adjust treatment timings as per our child's schedule.  We are yet to see the results but so far very happy with the course of treatment..
